textBox.richText: Few month ago I have been invited to join the Organising Committee of the ACM Conference on Image and Video Retrieval (CIVR) as a Practitioner Chair together with Edward Chang from Google China and Roelof van Zwol from Yahoo Spain to organize the practioners day. It has become a tradition that the final day of the CIVR is a practitioners day where the researchers are joined by practitioners and will meet peers from multimedia industry. CIVR 2009 will be help on the Island of Santorini, Greece, 8-10 July 2009.
